name: Nikwax Tent and Gear Solar Proof Water Repellent 500ml
categories: Tent and Gear Solar Proof Water Repellent 500
description: Get water repellency plus UV protection in one quick-drying, solvent-free fluid. Great for weatherproofing gear including tents, packs, panniers, gaiters, and non-breathable rainwear.For best results, use with Tech Wash or other mild detergent.Can be applied to wet fabrics.500ml bottle with spray head.
